subject: CNN.com Daily Top 10
body:

Lohan's weekend ends asleep in car
Lindsay Lohan, who was arrested on suspicion of driving under the influence Saturday, photographed slumped in the passenger seat of a car

10. Woman on death row still a rarity




 
















Miss USA tumbles
Miss USA Rachel Smith takes a tumble during the evening gown competition at the Miss Universe pageant. (May 29)
